My

Learning

Journey

2021 - 2022
Throughout my educational journey in high school, I've learning key languages and technologies such as HTML, CSS, PHP and JavaScript.
2022 - 2023
During a remarkable 10-month internship at Illiyin Studio, I had the opportunity to gain much more knowledge and put my knowledge into action. There I do also learned how to create a website using platform such as Webflow to build a visually stunning template website and WordPress, with WordPress I focus on learning on WordPress Elementor and a litle bit of custom theme development.
